sources.title: 1954 Shield For Murder Howard W. Koch Edmond O Brien Vose
ShieldForMurder 201704
sources.description: a corrupt cop murders for some quick cash

sources.title: Shield For Murder
sources.description: Featuring Edmond O'Brien, Marla English, John Agar, Emile Meyer, William Schallert, Claude Akins, and Herbert Butterfield. The movie is split into two parts: Shield_for_Murder_1954_part_1 and Shield_for_Murder_1954_part_2. [The "MPEG4" files are the smallest files, and they are the source files. Download them if your player can handle h.265 (HEVC).]

sources.title: Ogbbhf774664
sources.description: Title: Shield for Murder Summary: When a brutal police detective Lt. murders a bookmaker's runner for $25,000 in cash, a deaf mute sees him do it and now he finds he must kill again to cover his tracks. Directed by: Howard W. Koch, Edmond O'Brien Actors: Production Company: Camden Productions Inc. Release Date: September 1954 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.75 : 1 A vicious cop kills a bookie's runner and steals $25,000 from the corpse. He then frames everyone in sight in order to keep the money to buy a new home for his would-be lounge singer girlfriend.

sources.title: Shield for Murder (1954)
sources.description: A crooked detective masterminds a robbery then fights to keep his money. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/shield-for-murder-1954/

metadata.Plot: A vicious cop kills a bookie's runner and steals $25,000 from the corpse. He then frames everyone in sight in order to keep the money to buy a new home for his would-be lounge singer girlfriend.
metadata.Writer: Richard Alan Simmons, John C. Higgins, William P. McGivern
metadata.Actors: Edmond O'Brien, John Agar, Marla English
